content: april 21 2021 all of the accessories have been added except for the duck floatie i will work on that and get it added asap april 12 2021 this is a scrap yarn project that i used a number of different unlabeled worsted weight yarns for so i unfortunately can t tell you exact colors this is a little character that s meant to sit on a desk or shelf with different hats/accessories you can switch out with the seasons and holidays in an effort to get this pattern published asap i have not put it through my normal testing so if you find something incorrect or that doesn t make sense to you please let me know so that i can correct the error i am currently working on creating and photographing the accessories and will update this pattern as i do starting with the basic patterns that can be customized for the different hats by changing the colors and adding appliques and such please have fun with this i d love to see what you come up with for the accessories
